Posts.Content: I am really trying to get an idea on what the percentage of people who have recurrences of Breast cancer (estrogen and progesterone receiptive).  I am now 53 dx at 42.  I have found a small lump and I panicing a bit.
Posts.Title: Breast cancer recurrence after 10-years

Posts.Content: I don't know what I am going to do if that is the same thing I face.  Like you I had a lumpectomy; 17 lymph nodes revove (4 were possitive); chemotherapy (very aggressive); radiation and 2 1/2 years of Arimidex.  I now too have a lump in the same breat and I feel like "here I go again".  I am seriously thinking if it is the case the Cancer is back of doing both breasts my problem will be the expense as I know my insurance will not pay for the non-cancerous breast removal and I am on a fixed income.  Good luck and know that others will be thinking and praying for you.
Posts.Title: Breast cancer recurrence after 10-years

Posts.Content: Go through with the biopsy.  I was 42 and was told the same it was probably a cyst.  I had no family cancer history.  I enbded up having two surgeries; chemotherapy and radiation.  Been cancer free (according to my mammograms) for over 10 years.  Just found a lump again so "here I go again" with a doctor appointment and mammogram.  Keep your spirits up it maybe just what they say, have a friend that has gone through it twice and no cancer.
Posts.Title: Newby breast lump needing advice
